Texts.Chs: 现在是时候最大化你的蜂蜜产量了，去制造一台^orange;工业离心机^white;。你需要找到一些^orange;沙漠蜂^reset;，当然还需要金色玻璃，关于玻璃，去沙漠应该可以发现点什么。
Texts.Eng: Now it's time to maximize your output. Build an ^orange;Industrial Centrifuge^reset;. You'll need to find some ^orange;arid bees^reset; to make the golden glass you need. Try the desert!

Texts.Chs: 与蜂蜜罐一起配对，你将会得到成吨的蜂蜜。不过别忘记了，这个设备需要电力才能运转。
Texts.Eng: Paired together with a Honey Jarrer, you'll get tons of honey. I should mention that this station requires power to run, which you can get from an Alternator or better power source.
